00001 #########################################################################
00002 #
00003 #  Implements subtraction
00004 #
00005 package Parser::BOP::subtract;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that the operand types match.
00011 #
00012 sub _check {
00013   my $self = shift;
00014   return if ($self->checkStrings());
00015   return if ($self->checkLists());
00016   return if ($self->checkNumbers());
00017   if ($self->{lop}->canBeInUnion && $self->{rop}->canBeInUnion) {
00018     if ($self->{lop}->isSetOfReals || $self->{rop}->isSetOfReals) {
00019       $self->{type} = Value::Type('Union',2,$Value::Type{number});
00020       foreach my $op ('lop','rop') {
00021     if (!$self->{$op}->isSetOfReals) {
00022       if ($self->{$op}->class eq 'Value') {
00023         $self->{$op}{value} =
00024           $self->Package("Interval")->promote($self->context,$self->{$op}{value});
00025       } else {
00026         $self->{$op} = bless $self->{$op}, 'Parser::List::Interval';
00027       }
00028       $self->{$op}->typeRef->{name} = $self->context->{parens}{interval}{type};
00029     }
00030       }
00031     }
00032     return;
00033   }
00034   my ($ltype,$rtype) = $self->promotePoints();
00035   if (Parser::Item::typeMatch($ltype,$rtype)) {$self->{type} = $ltype}
00036   else {$self->matchError($ltype,$rtype)}
00037 }
00038 
00039 sub canBeInUnion {(shift)->type eq 'Union'}
00040 
00041 #
00042 #  Do subtraction
00043 #
00044 sub _eval {$_[1] - $_[2]}
00045 
00046 #
00047 #  Remove subtracting zero
00048 #  Turn subtraction from zero into negation.
00049 #  Turn subtracting a negative into addition.
00050 #  Factor out common negatives.
00051 #
00052 sub _reduce {
00053   my $self = shift; my $equation = $self->{equation};
00054   my $reduce = $equation->{context}{reduction};
00055   return $self->{lop} if $self->{rop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'x-0'};
00056   return Parser::UOP::Neg($self->{rop}) if $self->{lop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'0-x'};
00057   if ($self->{rop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'x-(-y)'}) {
00058     $self = $self->Item("BOP")->new($equation,'+',$self->{lop},$self->{rop}{op});
00059     $self = $self->reduce;
00060   } elsif ($self->{lop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'(-x)-y'}) {
00061     $self = Parser::UOP::Neg
00062       ($self->Item("BOP")->new($equation,'+',$self->{lop}{op},$self->{rop}));
00063     $self = $self->reduce;
00064   }
00065   return $self;
00066 }
00067 
00068 $Parser::reduce->{'x-0'} = 1;
00069 $Parser::reduce->{'0-x'} = 1;
00070 $Parser::reduce->{'x-(-y)'} = 1;
00071 $Parser::reduce->{'(-x)-y'} = 1;
